SEARCH
Package fi.tuni.olvander.citybicyclejourneys.stations

Class StationController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.olvander.citybicyclejourneys.stations.StationController
@Controller public class StationController extends Object
A Station Controller class used to make accessing City Bicycle Station
related data possible with the help of endpoints and other methods.
Since:
1.21
Version:
2023.12.13
Author:
Olli Pertovaara

    private org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate

    The Station Repository for interacting with the Station database.

    • stationDb

      @Autowired private StationRepository stationDb
      The Station Repository for interacting with the Station database.

    • jdbcTemplate

      @Autowired private org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate
      A Jdbc Template for interacting with the H2 database
      which has Stations and Bicycle Journeys as tables.

  • Method Details

    • getStations

      @RequestMapping(value="api/stations/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<Station>> getStations()
      An endpoint for getting all the available Stations.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with an Iterable Station List

    • getStationWithId

      @RequestMapping(value="api/stations/{id}/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Station> getStationWithId(@PathVariable String id) throws Exception
      An endpoint for getting one single Station.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Station
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with a Station with URL path id
      Throws:
      Exception - StationNotFoundException / IdNotANumberException

    • getTotalJourneysStartingFromStation

      @RequestMapping(value="api/stations/{id}/totalJourneysFrom/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> getTotalJourneysStartingFromStation(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam int[] selectedMonths) throws Exception
      An endpoint for getting the total number of journeys starting from a
      Station with the id in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      id - The id in the URL path
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 months selected (int values)
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with the Journey count (Int)
      Throws:
      Exception - StationNotFoundException / IdNotANumberException

    • getTotalJourneysEndingAtStation

      @RequestMapping(value="api/stations/{id}/totalJourneysTo/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> getTotalJourneysEndingAtStation(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam int[] selectedMonths) throws Exception
      An endpoint for returning the total number of journeys ending at the
      Station with the id in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Station whose journeys are fetched
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 months selected (int values)
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with the Journey count (Int)
      Throws:
      Exception - StationNotFoundException / IdNotANumberException

    • getAverageDistanceStartingFromStation

      @RequestMapping("api/stations/{id}/averageDistanceFrom/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Double> getAverageDistanceStartingFromStation(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam int[] selectedMonths) throws Exception
      An endpoint to get the average distance of A Bicycle Journey
      starting from the Station whose id is in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      id - The Station id whose average distance is fetched
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 selected months (int values)
      Returns:
      Response Entity with an avg distance as a Double
      Throws:
      Exception - StationNotFoundException / IdNotANumberException

    • getAverageDistanceEndingAtStation

      @RequestMapping("api/stations/{id}/averageDistanceTo/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Double> getAverageDistanceEndingAtStation(@PathVariable String id, int[] selectedMonths) throws Exception
      An endpoint for getting the average distance of a Bicycle Journey
      ending at the Station whose id is in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      id - The Station id whose average distance is fetched
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 selected months (int values)
      Returns:
      Response Entity with an avg distance as a Double
      Throws:
      Exception - StationNotFoundException / IdNotFoundException

    • getAverageJourneyDistanceFromDb

      public double getAverageJourneyDistanceFromDb(String sql)
      Returns the average distance from the Bicycle Journey database.
      Parameters:
      sql - The sql query to be performed
      Returns:
      The average distance (a Double)

    • getTop5ReturnStationsStartingFrom

      @RequestMapping("api/stations/{id}/top5ReturnStationsStartingFrom/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArrayList<Station>> getTop5ReturnStationsStartingFrom(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam int[] selectedMonths) throws Exception
      An endpoint for returning the top 5 return Stations starting from
      the Station whose id is in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Station
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 selected months (int values)
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with the top 5 Stations
      Throws:
      Exception - StationNotFoundException / IdNotANumberException

    • getTop5DepartureStationsEndingAt

      @RequestMapping("api/stations/{id}/top5DepartureStationsEndingAt/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArrayList<Station>> getTop5DepartureStationsEndingAt(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam int[] selectedMonths) throws Exception
      An endpoint for returning the top 5 departure Stations ending at the
      Station whose id is in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Station
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 months selected (int values)
      Returns:
      Response Entity with the top 5 Stations
      Throws:
      Exception - StationNotFoundException or IdNotFoundException

    • getMostPopularStations

      public ArrayList<Station> getMostPopularStations(String sql)
      Returns an ArrayList of the most popular Stations.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query to be performed
      Returns:
      An ArrayList having the most popular Stations

    • getNumberOfJourneysStartingFromStation

      public int getNumberOfJourneysStartingFromStation(String stationId, int[] selectedMonths)
      Returns the number of Bicycle Journeys starting from the Station
      having the specified Station id (not the real id but a reference id).
      Parameters:
      stationId - The Station id
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 months selected (int values)
      Returns:
      The number (an int value) of Bicycle Journeys

    • getNumberOfJourneysEndingAtStation

      public int getNumberOfJourneysEndingAtStation(String stationId, int[] selectedMonths)
      Returns the number of Bicycle Journeys ending at the Station
      having the specified Station id (not the real id but a reference id).
      Parameters:
      stationId - The Station id
      selectedMonths - 1 to 3 months selected (int values)
      Returns:
      The Number of Journeys ending at the Station

    • getDepartureDateRangeForSelectedMonths

      public String getDepartureDateRangeForSelectedMonths(int[] selectedMonths)
      Returns a date range used in an SQL query where the departure date
      is the determining factor for the selected months.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int array values
      Returns:
      A String that can be used in an SQL query

    • getNumberOfJourneysFromDb

      public int getNumberOfJourneysFromDb(String sql)
      Returns the number of Bicycle Journeys from the Bicycle Journey
      database with a condition given in the Sql query, e.g. Journeys
      starting from or ending at the Station.
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL query used for fetching the number of Journeys
      Returns:
      The number (an int value) of Bicycle Journeys
